title: $770 - 2 Bed / 1 Bath Condo with Garbage Included and Fenced Yard
posting_body: to schedule a tour or any questions.
We have immediate move-in availability on a 2/1 758 ft² newly renovated condo with fresh paint.

Thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, our floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities including a breakfast bar, all-electric kitchen, pantry, tile flooring, mini blinds, private backyard, and more.
Many local convenient stores are nearby.
We bring you to comfort living at its best.
